timeline.bodyText: Do we need this. Can't we simply remove the cause for it?
timeline.author: holgerhagen

timeline.bodyText: This is not very nice. Please use @RequestMapping(method = { GET, POST}) instead of duplicating the method. Thanks!
timeline.author: mustaphazorgati

replies.bodyText: This won't fix sonarcloud's issue: "This rule raises an issue when method is missing and when the method parameter is configured with more than one verb"
replies.author: sofie29

timeline.bodyText: Is this intentional? You changed the request method from get to delete.
timeline.author: mustaphazorgati

timeline.message:
TSK-1112 Changed @RequestMapping to @PostMapping / @GetMapping / ...

TSK-1112 deleted suppressWarnings

TSK-1112 Removed duplicated method
